sentences: Prootonitest ja neutronitest koosnev aatomi keskel asuv keskosa on alati laetud.
Tuumafüüsikas uuritakse positiivselt laetu tuumade omadusi.
context: The Estonian word 'laetud' is an adjective form meaning 'charged' or 'loaded'. In the context of atomic physics as shown in the dictionary definition, it specifically refers to being positively charged. This word describes something that has an electric charge - in this case, the nucleus of an atom which contains protons (positively charged particles) and neutrons (neutral particles), giving the overall nucleus a positive electrical charge.
